sourcesContent: import{disposables as m}from'../../utils/disposables.js';import{isIOS as f}from'../../utils/platform.js';function T(){if(!f())return{};let l;return{before(){l=window.pageYOffset},after({doc:o,d:t,meta:s}){function i(n){return s.containers.flatMap(e=>e()).some(e=>e.contains(n))}t.microTask(()=>{if(window.getComputedStyle(o.documentElement).scrollBehavior!=="auto"){let e=m();e.style(o.documentElement,"scroll-behavior","auto"),t.add(()=>t.microTask(()=>e.dispose()))}t.style(o.body,"marginTop",`-${l}px`),window.scrollTo(0,0);let n=null;t.addEventListener(o,"click",e=>{if(e.target instanceof HTMLElement)try{let r=e.target.closest("a");if(!r)return;let{hash:c}=new URL(r.href),a=o.querySelector(c);a&&!i(a)&&(n=a)}catch{}},!0),t.addEventListener(o,"touchmove",e=>{e.target instanceof HTMLElement&&!i(e.target)&&e.preventDefault()},{passive:!1}),t.add(()=>{window.scrollTo(0,window.pageYOffset+l),n&&n.isConnected&&(n.scrollIntoView({block:"nearest"}),n=null)})})}}}export{T as handleIOSLocking};
